descriptions.value: A critical vulnerability in the authentication mechanism allows remote attackers to bypass security controls and gain unauthorized access to sensitive data. This vulnerability affects all versions prior to 2.5.0.

entries.title: SQL Injection Attack
entries.description: SQL injection is a code injection technique that exploits security vulnerabilities in an application's software.
entries.summary: Attackers can use SQL injection to access, modify, or delete data in the database.

entries.description: This is a non-security related entry about general software updates

descriptions.value: Remote code execution vulnerability in network protocol handler allows attackers to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.
